item.title: [PI] adding Take B.O.B button (only works if summoning added)
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

For those of you that dont know exactly what this is its a button to add items in your stored b.o.b or summoning npcs “custom” bank to your inventory automatically. Okay lets move on.

In PlayerAssistant.java add this public void removeBoBItems(int slot, int amount) { if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) { c.getItems().addItem(c.storeditems[slot], amount); c.occupied[slot] = false; c.storeditems[slot] = 0; c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.totalstored -= slot; } else { c.getItems().resetTempItems(); c.getItems().resetBank(); c.sendMessage("Not enough space in your inventory."); return; } }
Now this part depends on what button you decide to choose to take b.o.b but here is mine.
In ClickingButtons.java add this[code]case 66117:
switch(c.lastsummon) {

				case 6807:

case 6874:
case 6868:
case 6795:
case 6816:
case 6873:
for (int i = 0; i < 28; i++) {
if (c.storeditems[i] > 0) {
c.getPA().removeBoBItems(i, 0);
c.startAnimation(827);
c.stopMovement();
}
}
break;
}
break;[/code]
66117 is the button id change it to whatever you would like!

Read full topic
